SEARCH
Package dataManager

Class CourseList

java.lang.Object
dataManager.CourseList
public class CourseList extends Object
Represents a list of courses and provides utility methods for managing courses.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static List<Course>
    course
    A list containing Course objects read from the CSV file.
    static final String
    filename
    The filename of the CSV file storing course data.

      Parameters:

    • getCourseById

      public static Course getCourseById(String courseId)
      Retrieves a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Course object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getCourseByLecturer

      public static Course getCourseByLecturer(String lecturerName)
      Retrieves a course by its lecturer's name.
      Parameters:
      lecturerName - The name of the lecturer.
      Returns:
      The Course object taught by the specified lecturer, or null if not found.
